entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
